articles.author: Abhishek De
articles.title: Why Kyrgyzstan hostels housing Indian, Pakistani students were targeted - India Today
articles.description: Violence has erupted in Kyrgyzstan with mobs targeting hostels housing students from India Bangladesh and Pakistan What led to the violence and why so many students from South Asia go to study in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content: Kyrgyzstan's capital, Bishkek, has been on the boil over the last couple of days, with violent mobs targeting hostels housing students from India, Bangladesh and Pakistan. Three Pakistani students ha… [+4862 chars]
